DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the rate of regression and progression of low-grade squamous intraepithelial lesion comparing expectant vs. ablative treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Observational vs. Ablative Treatment for Low-grade Squamous Intraepithelial Lesions.
DOC.mesh_term: Squamous Intraepithelial Lesions of the Cervix
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of LowGrade Squamous Intraepithelial Lesion by cervical cytology. Positive Biopsy for LowGrade Squamous Intraepithelial Lesion after colposcopy. Serological detection of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
